intro:
Introduction of Nexon Small Library

The Nexon Small Library presents the power of imagination to the children of the future.

The Nexon Small Library

A magical place that makes reading enjoyable.

The Nexon Small Library, which Nexon has been working on for a long time, is a social contribution project that aims to present children with books and a comfortable reading space. The Nexon Small Library, started in 2005 by donating books to local children's centers and elementary schools nationwide, has evolved to provide cozy reading rooms in local children's centers and welfare centers.

Through the imaginative workshop, we will create a library with special stories reflecting children's desires.
Even after the Small Library was established, we continue to make connections with children by sending out books every month, dispatching teachers to help children read books, and conducting a reading guidance program.

Also, children from all Nexon Small Libraries gather in one place every year, and participate in annual book report contest which is loved by many people.

Current Status

  • Since2005
  • The number of Libraries119
  • The number of children used69,000
  • The number of donated books114,696

Representative Small Librarys by Region

Metropolitan Area40Gangwon-Do Province10Chungcheong-Do Province13Gyeongsang-Do Province15Jeolla-Do Province22Jeju-Do Province13

  • Image Library - 91th Store

    A Small Library centered on books related to design graphics located at Nexon's head office

  • Imgye Youth Culture Center - 117th Store

    A small house-shaped Small Library built in Imgye Youth Culture Center

  • Chungcheong-Do Yesan District Children's Center - 106th Store

    A Small Library designed to be a playground.

  • Busan Vision Youth Regional Children Center - 108th Store

    A Small Library with a warm atmosphere for young people.

  • Leijado Hopeful Nest Children's Center – 116th Score

    A Small Library with green and blue motifs of the sea and forests.

  • Jeju Regional Rehabilitation Hospital – 107th Store

    A small, brightly decorated Small Library for children who spend a lot of time in the hospital.
이전다음

Small Library Created as You Imagine

  • Nexon creates Small Librarys for all children in the country.

    Nexon makes Small Librarys for children all over the country.
    Beyond the metropolitan area, we hope that children in the island and mountain will be able to meet the boundless world through books.

  • Reflects the opinions of children who will be the owners of the Small Library.

    The Nexon Small Library is designed to reflect the opinions of the children and teachers who will use the Small Library as much as possible.
    I hope these processes can lead to a sense of mastery of space and affection for the library.

  • Listen to the children's imaginary Small Library.

    Host an imaginative workshop with children who will be the protagonists of the space
    Designed to dissolve great ideas from the workshop in every corner of the Small Library.

  • To have a healthy dream in a healthy space.

    Nexon Small Library is a reconstruction architecture by remodeling dead spaces for various reasons.
    Designed to be a healthy space with eco-friendly materials as it is a space for children.
이전다음

A never-ending story of a Small Library

Imaginary Seed Reading Program:
Nexon have a reading guidance program through an agreement with a professional educational company to help children become accustomed to reading at Nexon Small Libraries.
More
Book Report Contest/Awards Ceremony
Nexon holds an annual book report contest and awards ceremony to bring children a real sense of achievement.
More
Overseas Nexon Small Library
Since 2011, Nexon has been building libraries overseas
so that children around the world can dream
for the future through books.
More
Book Gift Box
Nexon provides a small number of monthly books for the children's continuing interest in reading even after opening the bookstores
intro1:
Introduction of Nexon Small Library

The Nexon Small Library presents the power of imagination to the children of the future.

Overseas Nexon Small Library

Space where dreams of children around the world are realized

The desire to achieve your dream will be the same everywhere in the world.Nexon creates a small Small Library with books and IT devices that will showcase a variety of worlds every year,for children in the world who have lost their chance to dream, or even dream, in a harsh environment.A small overseas Small Library is a space that conveys hope to children, their families and the community.

Current Status

  • Since2011
  • The number of Libraries7
  • Total number of children used18,876
  • 1st Small Library - Republic of BurundiA small Library with a large volume of
    books, furniture and IT equipment
    in Republic of Burundi, Africa.
  • 2nd Small Library - NepalA small Library built by installing a solar generator for the elementary schools
    with poor electrical conditions in remote areas.
  • 3rd Small Library - CambodiaA Small Library built in Thomor Da School in Cambodia,
    where Korean language education is active.
  • 4th Small Library - MyanmarA small Library built in Yangon, Myanmar, along with online community members of the game called ‘Mabinogi’.
  • 5th Small Library - LaosA small Library built at the School in Paxan Village, Laos with college student volunteers.
  • 6th Small Library – IndonesiaA small Library built in Medan, Indonesia with online community members of the game called ‘the kingdom of the wind.
  • 7th Small Library – MongoliaA small Library consisting of a library on the first floor and a communication center on the second floor.

Find Out More

  • Nexon Small Library
  • Imaginary Seed Reading Program
  • Book Report Contest/Awards Ceremony
intro2:
Introduction of Nexon Small Library

The Nexon Small Library presents the power of imagination to the children of the future.

Imaginary Seed Reading Program

The power to think for children who are unfamiliar with reading

Nexon conducts a reading guidance program through an agreementwith a professional education company to help children become accustomed to reading.Children learn to understand other people's thoughts by talking about books they read with their teachers, improving their logic, and listening to their friends' stories.Deep reading experience enhance children's thoughts and imagination, and eventually help to develop good reading habits.

Current Status

  • Since2013
  • The number of Small Librarys142
  • Total number of children used1,131
Read books with teachers.
The professional reading teachers visits the Small Library selected through the screening process.Children attend reading discussion and essay classes by level once a week for five months. Engaging in various ways of reading, such as reading together and summarizing, fosters children the power to make the story of the book mine.
Build up children's self-confidence.
Through Imaginary Seed Reading Program, a child from a multicultural family who was not good at reading Korean was able to read and write Korean well. Some children won the book report contest, and had a dream of becoming a writer. In addition to reading education, we aim to foster children's self-confidence and dreams through the program.

Find Out More

  • Nexon Small Library
  • Book Report Contest/Awards Ceremony
  • Overseas Nexon Small Library
intro3:
Introduction of Nexon Small Library

The Nexon Small Library presents the power of imagination to the children of the future.

Book Report Contest / Awards

Children who are praised and become closer to books

Nexon holds an annual book report contest and awards ceremony to encourage childrento read more books at Nexon Small Library.Children who are struggling with writing are able to develop confidence in reading and writing with participation of the contest,and through the experience of being on stage and winning prizes, they develop a sense of accomplishment for themselves.

Current Status

  • Since2011
  • 개최 횟수8개
  • 총 출품작 수2,520편
  • 시상식 참여자 수1,226명
The book report contents that make children reading more books
The annual Book Report Contest is the most popular program that children actively participate in. Participating from first grade to third grade in elementary school, the contest begins with the announcement of recommendations and public offerings from Nexon's small library. The manuscript submitted after a month of recruitment will be reviewed by professional children's book writers and a number of winners will be selected.
Awards Ceremony, The Festival of Nexon Library Children
The award ceremony at the Nexon headquarters is like a festival. We have a variety of fun activities and delicious meals together, and we also offer the best performance that children like most. All the winners will come up on stage one by one to receive the award with applause. We hope children will remember the award ceremony that they would like to come back to, so that they can constant interest in reading.

More

  • Nexon Small Library
  • Overseas Nexon Small Library
  • Imaginary Seed Reading Program

Introduction of Nexon Small Library

The Nexon Small Library presents the power of imagination to the children of the future.
intro_sec1:
The Nexon Small Library

Magical azit where reading is fun.

Nexon small library project is the most traditional social contribution project of Nexon. Since 2005, it has donated books to local children's centers and elementary schools nationwide and has developed into a cozy bookstore in idle space.
Nexon small library provides a special space by actually creating the space that children want through imaginative workshops.
We also invite children from the Nexon small library nationwide every year to the Nexon office to hold a Book report contest and provide a reading support program.
